Texts.Eng: A surfboard modeled after a Lilodon. Shred the waves - and the competition!
Texts.Chs: 仿鲨狗造型制成的冲浪板。乘风破浪，谁与争锋！

Texts.Eng: Floran doesn't need Lilodon surfboard to ssscare competition or prey!
Texts.Chs: 叶族人不需要鲨狗冲浪板来吓唬竞争对手或猎物！

Texts.Eng: Gliding upon a wave's crest should be an artful pursuit, but people have turned it into a silly diversion...
Texts.Chs: 在波峰上滑行应该是一种巧妙的追求，但人们已经把它变成了一种愚蠢的消遣。。。

Texts.Eng: I ain't too sure I got the sea legs to try and surf.
Texts.Chs: 我不太确定我是否有足够的能力尝试冲浪。

Texts.Eng: I was expecting this surfboard to feel scaly, but it's actually made of polished wood!
Texts.Chs: 我本以为这个冲浪板会有鳞片的感觉，但它实际上是用抛光的木头做的！

Texts.Eng: I'd like to try to surf one day. Hopefully without any actual Lilodon, though!
Texts.Chs: 我想有一天尝试冲浪。希望没有任何真正的鲨狗！

Texts.Eng: Surfing! Even wiping out can be fun, so long as there's a lifeguard nearby!
Texts.Chs: 冲浪！即使是掉进浪花里也很有趣，只要附近有救生员！

Texts.Eng: Very cute - the fin of the board resembles the fin atop actual Lilodon.
Texts.Chs: 非常可爱-板的鳍类似于实际鲨狗的鳍。
